runs.comm: good start by Lee, dug in short of a length outside off, gives Tamim a lifter, left alone
short of a length outside off again, this time Tamim gets some bat on it and pushes to point
short again and aimed at the body, Tamim gets on the backfoot and defends to the off side
Tamim backs away to whack that over the off side, Lee senses it and thuds it in short, the ball sails over Tamim's head, wide called
fuller in length and inviting the drive, Tamim flashes at it but the ball beats the bat
good length aimed at the body, played away back to Lee
first runs off the bat, Lee gives a bit of width outside off, Tamim sticks his blade out and glides to third man
begins with a slower ball, 103 kmh, bowled from the back of the hand, defended back to the bowler
good length on middle and off, Tamim shuffles and works it to the on side
Bracken fires that with good pace, pitches outside off, Nazimuddin chooses to leave it
good length outside off, opens the face and glides it to third man
inside out shot by Tamim, tries to work it to the on side, gets a leading edge which rolls to Clarke at backward point
short, banged in on off and middle, the ball sails over Tamim's head, not short enough to be called wide
good length, drifting on the pads, worked to the on side off the hips
Lee dishes out the short stuff to Nazimuddin who sways out of the way
between slip and keeper, Nazimuddin shapes for the cut, not much bounce on that as the ball gets the under-edge of the bat and rolls away quickly behind the bat
short, outside off, Nazimuddin lets it go
strives for that extra yard of pace and oversteps, the ball climbs off a good length outside off, Nazim leaves it
Free Hit: yorker on off stump, Nazimuddin walks across his stumps, unfortunately for him the ball hits the bottom of the bat and rolls to mid-on
good length on leg stump, Tamim flicks off his hips and beats the fielder at square leg, lightening fast outfield carries it to the boundary
full in length, shaping away outside off, Nazimuddin pokes at it
turned to the on side, tamim is a little slow off the blocks, dives at the crease and beats the throw
Nazimuddin swings across the line, doesnt get the desired timing as the ball is picked up at midwicket
overpitched, in the slot to drive on the off side,  Tamim throws the kitchen sink at it and misses it altogether
beaten again, slower ball, Tamim attempts to dab it to third man, doesnt read the slower ball well
pushed to the off side for a quick single
short of a length outside off, Tamim stays rooted to the crease and tries to cut square, beaten
short of a length outside off again, Tamim gets bat on it but doesnt get the placement
urgency creeps in as Tamim steps down the track, the ball is short and tamim slices it over point, not enough to reach the fence though
fine leg comes up and Tamim glances it uppishly off his pads, controlled stroke in the end as the ball beats all the fielders
punched off the backfoot to Symonds at deep point
rush of blood for Nazimuddin as he swishes across the line, the ball beats the bat and a half hearted appeal for a catch follows
wide outside off, Tamim slashes and misses, Bangladesh are struggling a bit
advances down the track and gets beaten again
drifting on the pads, worked away to the on side for a single
sliding down leg, Nazimussin tries to work it fine
breaks the shackles, full and wide, Nazimuddin gives room and slices it over point and cover, a couple of bounces and four
full and in the slot to drive, gets the placement wrong as cover picks it up
edged! short of a length outside off, Tamim stays at the crease, glances it past Gilchrist, first slip would have gobbled it up but there's no protection for that
turned off the hips to the on side
Nazimuddin swings across the line, struck on the pads, Johnson appeals
bouncer, Nazimuddin goes for the hook, the ball hits the helmet and lobs to point
down leg side and it's a no-ball as well, Johnson oversteps
Free Hit: Tamim fails to make use of it as he steps down and misses the ball trying to swing across the line, and it's another no ball!
Free Hit: Johnson slips in a slower ball, Tamim takes a few paces forward and swings blindly, gets beaten, Gilchrist fails to gather it as the ball goes down to fine leg
good reflexes, driven hard to cover, Ponting gets a hand to it, fumbles and in the second attempt takes the catch, all over in a flash
tossed on off and middle, played to the on side
glanced to the off side
slow and flighted on middle and leg, nudged off the pads to the on side
takes a few paces forward and swings to deep midwicket
attempted reverse sweep, doesnt come off
nudged to the on side, another quiet over
outside off and turning away, chopped towards point
tossed on middle and off, Aftab employs the sweep
thats a bonus, Clarke slips that wide down leg, Tamim tries to glance it but the ball beats him and Gilchrist
nudged to the on side
full and driven hard down to cover
down leg side, Tamim sweeps, the ball misses the bat and another wide
tamim shows some intent and steps down the track, lofts to long-on Lee runs across and makes a valiant attempt to catch that on the dive
tossed on middle and leg, Aftab sweeps uppishly to long leg
lofted to long leg, the ball appears headed to the rope, however the backspin holds it backjust inches before the rope
chopped down to the off side for a single
pushed back to Symonds
swept to Bracken who is stationed very fine at short fine leg
Tamim steps down the pitch and drives to long-off
tossed up into the blockhole on middle stump, pushed to point off the front foot
driven to Brad Hodge at deep cover for a single
caught! Tamim gives Clarke the charge and tries to loft him down the ground, he slices it high in the air and Ricky Ponting settles under the catch at cover and judges it to perfection
driven off the front foot to deep cover for a single
slower ball slants into Aftab's blockhole from round the wicket, pushed into the covers off the front foot
excellent line and length from Bracken, angling across the right-hander from over the wicket this time, defended towards cover point for a single
Aftab leans across and paddles one from leg stump past Gilchrist who is standing up to the stumps, the ball runs to the fine-leg boundary
defended towards backward point on the back foot
good length ball on middle and off stump, another slower ball, Aftab pulls it towards midwicket
fuller ball on off stump, Aftab chips it in the air towards long-off
starts off with a wide outside off stump
Aftab tries to smash a length ball down the ground but gets an outside edge to third man
full ball outside off stump, Ashraful latches on to the loose offering and drives the ball over point for four
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Ashraful tries to run the ball towards third man but gets beaten by the bounce and the angle across him
how did that fall safe? Ashraful pulled the ball high in the air, it was in the air for ages but it fell safely midway to the square-leg boundary with three fielder's converging on it
driven in the air firmly towards long-off
Ashraful waits for a short of a length delivery that is angled into him and opens the face at the last moment to run it down to third man who has been placed rather fine on the boundary

caught! Ashraful backs away to make room and tries to loft over the off side, Clark foxes him with the slower ball and he ends up lofting it tamely towards Symonds who runs across from cover towards point to hold an easy catch
defended towards point off the back foot
played behind square for a single, Gilchrist runs across and fields
banged in short on middle stump, pulled to long leg
Aftab backs away to make room and smashes it straight past Clark for a single
low full toss, driven to cover off the front foot
Shakib backs away and cuts a good length ball past point, Clark runs to his left at third man and fields
Shakib tries to cut off the back foot but gets cramped for room and is beaten
full ball on off and middle stump, driven through midwicket for one more
Johnson bowls a slower ball from round the wicket and beats Aftab's attempted heave down the ground
and he follows up the slower ball with a super quick one and strikes Aftab on the body after he misses the pull shot

Aftab backs away and drives a full ball towards cover where Ricky Ponting dives to his left to stop the ball going past him, Ponting pushes the ball a little away from him and the batsman run the second
Shakib gets down on one knee, moves his front foot out of the way and slog-sweeps Clarke over midwicket for the first six of the match, it's been a long time coming
Shakib gets off strike with a single
Aftab backs away towards leg, Clarke follows him and Aftab lofts the full toss to long-on
Shakib once again targets the deep midwicket region and connects superbly with the slog sweep, the ball bounces once before reaching the boundary
defended back to the bowler
Clarke finishes the over with two dot balls, this one is bowled fast and Shakib once again plays it back to Clarke
Aftab moves towards leg and lofts Lee's full delivery cleanly over extra cover, the outfield is slow and the ball just about reaches the boundary
Aftab lofts Lee high over midwicket, the ball bounces just inside the boundary and stops, the batsmen had assumed that it was going for six and ran just one, poor cricket from Bangladesh
caught! Shakib backs away and tries to cut but Lee follows him and cramps him for room with a short of a length ball, Shakib gets a thick edge that is taken by Gilchrist
bowled first ball! Lee fires in the yorker on off stump, Mortaza backs away trying to hit on the off side and is clean bowled

he's got him! Lee's angles the ball from a good length into Alok Kapali who moves across his stumps and tries to play through midwicket, he gets hit flush on the pad and Asad Rauf raises the finger, awesome stuff from Lee
Lee tries to get four in four by greeting Reza with a perfect yorker, except for the fact that he had over-stepped, free hit coming up ...
Aftab lofts a length delivery straight to Johnson at long-on who takes the catch but it can't be out because it is a free hit
Reza tries to cut from outside off stump but gets beaten by a slower ball
Reza doesn't move his feet and tries to pull Clark from outside off stump, once again he gets beaten
Reza tries to flick a fuller ball but misses and gets hit on the pad, the batsmen run a leg bye towards the off side
Aftab moves across his stumps and paddles Clark towards fine leg
Clark bowls a full ball angling into leg stump, Reza had backed away to hit across the line towards midwicket and gets beaten
played with an open face down to third man
excellent slower ball outside the off stump, Aftab had backed away towards leg stump and was beaten by the change in pace
driven to long-off for a single
the attempted yorker ends up as a full toss which Reza inside-edges on to the pad, Lee had over-stepped again so it's a free hit
Aftab moves towards the off side and lofts Lee towards deep midwicket where Hayden takes the catch, once again it can't be out off a free hit
banged in short over off and middle stump, Reza tries to cut but gets beaten
once again Lee bowls the short ball and once again Reza gets beaten on the cut
Reza backs away towards leg, Lee follows him with a full ball which gets driven to long-on
full ball outside off stump, Reza tries to drive through the offside but gets beaten
pulled to deep midwicket for  a single

caught! Aftab gives Bracken the charge and tries to slog him over midwicket, there's no pace on the ball from Bracken and Aftab skies it in the air to Brad Hodge who takes a well-judged catch looking straight into the sun
Reza slogs Bracken high in the air down to long-on where Michael Hussey takes a superb catch just inside the boundary, he looks back to see where his back foot is, it is just inside the boundary
flicked off the pads behind square for a single
good length ball outside off stump, played with an open face down to third man
